attributes.action: stop the waste transfer station planing application in mountsorrel, leicestershier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i and others have known since 2006 that we were looked at as a site for a waste transfer site , but we / i object on the grounds that it will cause mess and parking problems is not a suitable site no matter what the local or county council say , your tony doherty.

rejection.details: Planning applications are, in the first instance, a matter which is delegated to local authorities to decide.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
